name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel
looks: The sword has a straight, double-edged blade made of polished steel. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip, and the pommel is decorated with an intricate design.

special_weapon_skills.sword_mastery: Grants a bonus to Sword Mastery skill when wielded.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made from iron.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a better grip.

special_weapon_skills.one_handed_swords: Allows the player to use one-handed swords with increased proficiency.

name: Stormbringer
description: A legendary sword said to harness the power of storms.
looks: Stormbringer is a longsword with an ornately designed hilt and a blade that seems to crackle with lightning. The hilt is wrapped in leather and adorned with runes that glow with a blue light.

special_weapon_skils.lightning_strike: Unleash a powerful lightning strike against enemies.
special_weapon_skils.thunderbolt_slash: Slash enemies with a charged attack, causing additional lightning damage.

name: Steel Chestplate
description: A heavy chestplate made of strong steel plates
looks: The chestplate is made up of overlapping steel plates, covering the entire torso and extending down to the hips. It also has shoulder and elbow guards, and a chainmail skirt for additional protection.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Longsword
description: A longsword made from durable steel
looks: The longsword is made from gleaming steel with a sharp double-edged blade. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skills.sword_1h: Allows the wielder to perform advanced sword techniques.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made of pure silver
looks: The Silver Sword is a longsword with a silver blade that gleams in the light. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with a silver crossguard and pommel.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Adamantium Sword
description: A legendary sword made from a rare and indestructible metal called adamantium.
looks: The Adamantium Sword has a shining silver blade with a razor-sharp edge. The hilt is adorned with intricate engravings and a gemstone embedded in the pommel.

special_weapon_skils.master_swordsmanship: Allows the wielder to use advanced swordsmanship techniques.

special_effects.unbreakable: This sword cannot be damaged or broken.

name: Dagger of Shadows
description: A sleek and deadly dagger imbued with the power of shadows.
looks: The Dagger of Shadows has a narrow blade made of darkened steel, almost appearing as if it is made of pure shadow. The handle is wrapped in black leather and adorned with small, sparkling gems.

special_weapon_skils.assassination: Grants a bonus to Assassination skill when wielded.

special_effects.shadow_strike: Chance to deal additional shadow damage with each attack.

name: Silver Bow
description: A sleek and elegant bow made of pure silver.
looks: The Silver Bow is a longbow made entirely of silver. It has a smooth and polished surface, with intricate engravings of nature motifs along the limbs. The grip is wrapped in black leather for a comfortable hold.

special_weapon_skills.archery: Grants a bonus to Archery skill when used.
